tooltip_shiftK: On page: press Shift+K to capture
instr_auto_step1: Click Auto Capture to capture all slides automatically.
instr_auto_stepManual1: Alternatively, for manual capture: click Select Area and drag on the page (Esc to cancel).
instr_auto_stepManual2: Then navigate and click Capture for each slide (or press Shift+K on the page).
instr_auto_step4: Reorder or delete below, then Print / Save to print or save as PDF.
instr_manual_step1: Click Select Area and drag on the page (Esc to cancel).
instr_manual_step2: Navigate and click Capture for each slide (or press Shift+K on the page).
instr_manual_step3: Reorder or delete below, then Print / Save to print or save as PDF.
empty_howTo: Click Select Area, drag on the page, then Capture each slide.
overlay_hint: Drag to select an area. Press Esc to cancel.
warning_cannotSelectOnPage: Cannot select on this page type
